main event: An unidentified radar sighting was recorded at Westover AFB, Massachusetts on January 24, 1951, believed to involve a B-47 carrying a radar beacon.
interesting points: The radar picked up unidentified returns that were not detected by other radar in the vicinity,The sighting lasted between 15-20 minutes,There was no known activity or meteorological condition to explain the radar returns,The weather conditions included a ceiling of 500 to 600 feet and visibility of 1/2 mile during the observation,Confirmed observers were qualified radar technicians and pilots.
